meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a laccolith.
meanings.sent1: The laccolithic rock formation stood out among the surrounding landscape.
meanings.sent2: The geologist studied the laccolithic structure to understand its unique features.
meanings.sent3: The laccolithic mountain seemed to have a personality of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was as laccolithic as the colorful layers of the rock.
meanings.sent5: The laccolithic pattern etched in my mind like a vivid painting.

meanings.definition: Resembling or pertaining to a laccolith.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a sculpture with a laccolithic shape.
meanings.sent2: The clouds in the sky had a laccolithic appearance, resembling the rock formations.
meanings.sent3: The laccolithic clouds seemed to be playing hide and seek with the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as laccolithic as the arching of the stone.
meanings.sent5: The laccolithic design of the building made it stand out from the rest.

meanings.definition: Involving or formed by a laccolith.
meanings.sent1: The laccolithic process of formation took millions of years.
meanings.sent2: The layers of sediment were laccolithic in nature, indicating a unique geological event.
meanings.sent3: The laccolithic event in history was remembered for its unusual occurrence.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to change careers was as laccolithic as the uplift of the rock layers.
meanings.sent5: The laccolithic impact of the discovery reshaped the scientific community.
